actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake erosion control measures at Lexington Harbor, Michigan.

summary.text: Modifies the Lexington Harbor, Michigan, project to direct the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to take measures to prevent further project-related erosion. Stipulates that this project shall be carried out on an emergency basis, and exempts such project from requirements which would otherwise be applicable.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake erosion control measures at Lexington Harbor, Michigan.
